response.original_title: Behemoth - Live Eschaton (The Art Of Rebellion)
response.overview: Polish death metal titans Behemoth present their fans with the bone crushing music and dark images they crave in this concert video, featuring the band playing a typically brutal live set in an Eastern European television studio.  Behemoth: Live Exshaton -- The Art of Rebellion captures the band tearing through eleven songs, including "From The Pagan Vastlands", "Satan's Sword", "Driven By The Five Winged Star", "Pure Evil", and more.
response.title: Behemoth - Live Eschaton (The Art Of Rebellion)

results.name: Behemoth - Chant for Eschaton 2000 (Live in Copenhagen, June 12th, 2010)
